title: Megan Gale says she misses her old baby bump and tells current mums to cherish the delicate time
text:
Megan Gale has revealed she misses the time she spent during pregnancy nurturing her baby bump.

The 44-year-old model made the confession on Instagram where she posed an open question to fans asking if they felt the same.

'Does anyone else have days where they miss their bumps?,' Megan asked her followers.

A treasured memory: Megan Gale has revealed she misses the time she spent during pregnancy nurturing her baby bump

'I love that my children are with me, growing and thriving, but I miss that feeling of growing them in my belly.'

The Mad Max star then sent out her love to mothers currently bearing children and told them to enjoy the time they have.

'For those that are pregnant right now - I know it can be tiring and challenging growing a human but try and enjoy that little soul growing in your tummy. It’s such a precious time,' Megan said.

'It's such a precious time': Megan also sent out her love to mothers currently bearing children and told them to enjoy the time they have

After posing the question to fans, Megan was met with a mixed reception from fellow stars and mums alike.

'Yep I miss it. But I hated it. But I loved it. But I miss it,' football WAG Rebecca Judd said.

Burns survivor and athlete Turia Pitt, who is currently pregnant with her second child, expressed her appreciation for her post.

Our family: Megan (right) met the retired AFL star Shaun Hampson, 31, (left) back in early 2011 and they welcomed son River in 2014 (bottom) and daughter Rosie in 2017 (being held)

'What I needed to hear this morning! It’s a love hate relationship for sure,' she said.

Some fans however flat out disagreed with Megan and said not everyone enjoyed a simple pregnancy.

'No, so painful during both pregnancies I could never understand how some women loved being pregnant. Yes it’s a privilege but I was in so much pain at the end,' a woman said.

'Yes and no...!!! If I looked this gorgeous, then probably more of a yes,' another mum said.

Inspiration burns victim and athlete Turia Pitt (pictured), who is currently pregnant with her second child, also expressed her appreciation for her post

The post comes after the model revealed to 7News on Friday that she isn't planning on expanding her young family with partner Shaun Hampson, 31, just yet.

Megan met the retired AFL star back in early 2011 and they welcomed son River in 2014 and daughter Rosie in 2017.

'I don't want to rush and have a third child because of my age.'

She also explained that she is focused on her two children River, five, and Rosie, two, as well as her thriving baby skin care business Mindful.

'It’s kind of like a rebirth, which is really exciting for me,' she said of her new role as an entrepreneur.
description: Megan Gale has revealed she misses the time she spent during pregnancy nurturing her baby bump.
authors: Tom Place For Daily Mail Australia
